question: Some students measure the mass of a small pile of leaves before and after the leaves decompose. Each time the students measure the mass, they place a container with the decomposing leaves on a balance. Before recording the mass of the leaves, the students must do which of the following?
candidate_answers: (A) Subtract the mass of the container (B) Add leaves from other plants to the container (C) Allow the leaves to settle in the container for a few days (D) Use a metric ruler to measure the volume of the container
answer: Use a metric ruler to measure the volume of the container
label: D
